messages.subject: Nihonto trader is back up
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all, They got hacked apparently, all seems to be fine now though I an going to look for a new method/place to host this board as they have way too many
messages.messageBody:
Hi all, They got hacked apparently, all seems to be fine now though I an going to look for a new method/place to host this board as they have way too many issues for my linking.

I'll keep you all posted.

cheers

Rich
